name: Chorus
description: A divine chorus rings out within a short (10 unit) radius centered on you, dealing 6 divine damage to all creatures who fail a resilience check of 6. For each undead or dark creature that reaches 0 health as a result of this spell, all allies within the radius gain morale up to a maximum of 6.
charge: Instead of it's usual effects, this spell can be used as an automatic accompaniment success when helping a song.
